trans-unit.source: A special column type for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control that contains the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Edit" name="Edit" href=""></xref> buttons for editing data items in each row.
trans-unit.target: En spesiell kolonnetype for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> kontroll som inneholder den <xref uid="langword_csharp_Edit" name="Edit" href=""> </xref> knappene for redigering dataelementer i hver rad.

trans-unit.source: Use the EditCommandColumn class to create a special column for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control that contains the `Edit`, `Update`, and `Cancel` buttons for each data row in the grid.
trans-unit.target: Bruk klassen EditCommandColumn til å opprette en bestemt kolonne for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontrollen som inneholder den `Edit`, `Update`, og `Cancel` knappene for hver dataraden i rutenettet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: These buttons allow you to edit the values of a row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Disse lar deg redigere verdiene i en rad i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: If no row is selected, an `Edit` button displays in the EditCommandColumn object for each data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen rad er merket, en `Edit` knappen viser i EditCommandColumn-objektet for hver datarad i det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: When the `Edit` button for an item is clicked, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditCommand> event is raised and the `Edit` button is replaced with the `Update` and `Cancel` buttons.
trans-unit.target: Når den `Edit` button for et element klikkes, den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditCommand>denne hendelsen oppstår og `Edit` knappen er erstattet med den `Update` og `Cancel` knapper.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditCommand>

trans-unit.source: You need to provide code to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditCommand> event.
trans-unit.target: Du må angi koden til å håndtere den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditCommand>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditCommand>

trans-unit.source: A typical event handler sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditItemIndex%2A> property to the selected row, and then rebinds the data to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: En vanlig hendelsesbehandling angir den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditItemIndex%2A>egenskapen til den valgte raden og rebinds data til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditItemIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You must provide values for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn.CancelText%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn.EditText%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn.UpdateText%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Du må angi verdier for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn.CancelText%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn.EditText%2A>, og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn.UpdateText%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn.UpdateText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn.EditText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn.CancelText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the associated buttons will not appear in the EditCommandColumn.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke, vises ikke tilknyttede knappene i EditCommandColumn.

trans-unit.source: The buttons in the EditCommandColumn can be set to display as hyperlinks or push buttons by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn.ButtonType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Knappene i EditCommandColumn kan konfigureres til å vise som hyperkoblinger eller knapper ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn.ButtonType%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn.ButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Clicking the `Update` or `Cancel` button raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.UpdateCommand> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CancelCommand> event, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du klikker den `Update` eller `Cancel` button hever den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.UpdateCommand>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CancelCommand>hendelsen henholdsvis.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CancelCommand> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.UpdateCommand>

trans-unit.source: You need to provide code to handle these events.
trans-unit.target: Du må angi kode for å behandle disse hendelsene.

trans-unit.source: A typical handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.UpdateCommand> event updates the data, sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditItemIndex%2A> property to `-1` (to deselect the item), and then rebinds the data to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Et vanlig behandlingsprogram for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.UpdateCommand>hendelsen oppdaterer dataene, angir den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditItemIndex%2A>egenskapen `-1` (for å oppheve elementet), og rebinds data til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditItemIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.UpdateCommand>

trans-unit.source: A typical handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CancelCommand> event sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditItemIndex%2A> property to `-1` (to deselect the item), and then rebinds the data to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Et vanlig behandlingsprogram for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CancelCommand>hendelsen angir den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditItemIndex%2A>egenskapen `-1` (for å oppheve elementet), og rebinds data til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.EditItemIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.CancelCommand>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > The EditCommandColumn object can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > For EditCommandColumn objektet kan brukes til å vise brukerinndata, som kan inneholde skadelig klientskript.

trans-unit.source: Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application.
trans-unit.target: Kontroller informasjonen som ble sendt fra en klient for kjørbare skript, SQL-setninger eller annen kode før det blir vist i programmet.

trans-unit.source: You can use validation controls to verify user input before displaying the input text in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke validering Kontroller bekrefte brukerinndata før den angitte teksten i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET gir et inndataforespørselen valideringsfunksjonen til å blokkere skript og HTML i brukerinndata.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Securing Standard Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [sikre standardkontroller](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), [slik: beskytte mot skriptet utnytter i et webprogram ved å bruke HTML-koding til strenger](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), og [validering brukerinndata i ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: By default, page validation is performed when an `Update` button in the EditCommandColumn control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Som standard siden valideringen utføres når en `Update` -knappen i EditCommandColumn-kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Page validation determines whether the input controls that are associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules that are specified by the validation control.
trans-unit.target: Siden validering bestemmer om inndata kontrollene som er knyttet til en validering kontrollere på siden med alle bestod valideringsreglene som er angitt av kontrollen validering.

trans-unit.source: To prevent page validation from occurring, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn.CausesValidation%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: For å forhindre siden validering oppstår, kan du angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn.CausesValidation%2A>egenskapen `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn.CausesValidation%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn> class.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren til å opprette og starte en ny forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the button type for the column.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir Knappetypen for kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: Use the ButtonType property to specify whether the buttons in the column display as push buttons or hyperlinks.
trans-unit.target: Bruk ButtonType-egenskapen til å angi om knappene i kolonnen vises som knapper eller hyperkoblinger.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonColumnType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonColumnType"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_LinkButton" name="LinkButton" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_LinkButton" name="LinkButton" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified button type is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonColumnType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte knapp-typen er ikke én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonColumnType"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text to display for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Cancel" name="Cancel" href=""></xref> command button in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir teksten som skal vises den <xref uid="langword_csharp_Cancel" name="Cancel" href=""> </xref> kommandoknappen i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the CancelText property to specify the text to display for the `Cancel` command button in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn>.
trans-unit.target: Bruk avbryttekst-egenskapen til å angi teksten som skal vises den `Cancel` kommandoknappen i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You must provide a value for the CancelText property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Du må angi en verdi for egenskapen avbryttekst.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the `Cancel` command button will not appear in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke, den `Cancel` kommando vises ikke i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen Hvis du velger, kan lagres automatisk på en ressursfil ved hjelp av en designer verktøyet.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>og [globalisering og lokalisering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The caption to display for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Cancel" name="Cancel" href=""></xref> command button in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Teksten som skal vises for den <xref uid="langword_csharp_Cancel" name="Cancel" href=""> </xref> kommandoknappen i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether validation is performed when an <xref uid="langword_csharp_Update" name="Update" href=""></xref> button in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn"></xref> object is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om valideringen utføres når en <xref uid="langword_csharp_Update" name="Update" href=""> </xref> -knappen i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn"> </xref> objekt klikkes.

trans-unit.source: By default, page validation is performed when an `Update` button in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Som standard siden valideringen utføres når en `Update` -knappen i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn>kontrollen klikkes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn>

trans-unit.source: Page validation determines whether the input controls that are associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules that are specified by the validation control.
trans-unit.target: Siden validering bestemmer om inndata kontrollene som er knyttet til en validering kontrollere på siden med alle bestod valideringsreglene som er angitt av kontrollen validering.

trans-unit.source: You can specify or determine whether validation is performed on both the client and the server when an `Update` button in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn> control is clicked by using the CausesValidation property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi eller fastslå om validering er utført på både klienten og serveren når en `Update` -knappen i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn>kontrollen klikkes ved hjelp av egenskapen CausesValidation.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn>

trans-unit.source: To prevent validation from being performed, set the CausesValidation property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: For å hindre at godkjenningen fra utført egenskapen CausesValidation til `false`.

trans-unit.source: When the value of the CausesValidation property is set to `true`, you can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn.ValidationGroup%2A> property to specify the name of the validation group for which an `Update` button in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn> object causes validation.
trans-unit.target: Når verdien for egenskapen CausesValidation er satt til `true`, du kan også bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn.ValidationGroup%2A>til å angi navnet på valideringsgruppen som en `Update` -knappen i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn>objektet får valideringen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn.ValidationGroup%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if validation is performed when an <xref uid="langword_csharp_Update" name="Update" href=""></xref> button in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn"></xref> is clicked; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>om validering skal skje når en <xref uid="langword_csharp_Update" name="Update" href=""> </xref> -knappen i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn"> </xref> er klikket; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text to display for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Edit" name="Edit" href=""></xref> button in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir teksten som skal vises den <xref uid="langword_csharp_Edit" name="Edit" href=""> </xref> -knappen i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the EditText property to specify the text to display for the `Edit` button in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk EditText-egenskapen til å angi teksten som skal vises den `Edit` -knappen i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You must provide a value for the EditText property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Du må angi en verdi for egenskapen EditText.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the `Edit` button will not appear in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke, den `Edit` knappen vises ikke i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen Hvis du velger, kan lagres automatisk på en ressursfil ved hjelp av en designer verktøyet.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>og [globalisering og lokalisering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The caption to display for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Edit" name="Edit" href=""></xref> button in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Teksten som skal vises for den <xref uid="langword_csharp_Edit" name="Edit" href=""> </xref> -knappen i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a cell within the column.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en celle i kolonnen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"></xref> that contains information about the cell to initialize.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"> </xref> som inneholder informasjon om cellen ikke.

trans-unit.source: The column number where the cell is located.
trans-unit.target: Antall kolonner der cellen finnes.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text to display for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Update" name="Update" href=""></xref> command button in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir teksten som skal vises den <xref uid="langword_csharp_Update" name="Update" href=""> </xref> kommandoknappen i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the UpdateText property to specify the text to display for the `Update` command button in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn>.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av UpdateText-egenskapen til å angi teksten som skal vises den `Update` kommandoknappen i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You must provide a value for the UpdateText property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Du må angi en verdi for egenskapen UpdateText.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the `Update` command button will not appear in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke, den `Update` kommando vises ikke i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen Hvis du velger, kan lagres automatisk på en ressursfil ved hjelp av en designer verktøyet.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>og [globalisering og lokalisering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The caption to display for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Update" name="Update" href=""></xref> command button in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Teksten som skal vises for den <xref uid="langword_csharp_Update" name="Update" href=""> </xref> kommandoknappen i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the group of validation controls for which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn"></xref> object causes validation when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir gruppen med validering Kontroller som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn"> </xref> objektet får valideringen når den legger inn på serveren.

trans-unit.source: Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category.
trans-unit.target: Valideringsgrupper kan du tilordne validering Kontroller på en side til en bestemt kategori.

trans-unit.source: Each validation group can be validated independently of other validation groups on the page.
trans-unit.target: Hver valideringsgruppe kan valideres uavhengig av andre valideringsgrupper på siden.

trans-unit.source: Use the ValidationGroup property to specify the name of the validation group for which the Update button in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn> object causes validation when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Bruk ValidationGroup-egenskapen til å angi navnet på valideringsgruppen som Oppdater-knappen i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn>objektet får valideringen når den legger inn på serveren.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn>

trans-unit.source: The ValidationGroup property has an effect only when the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn.CausesValidation%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ValidationGroup har en effekt bare når verdien for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn.CausesValidation%2A>er satt til `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn.CausesValidation%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you specify a value for the ValidationGroup property, only the validation controls that are part of the specified group are validated when the Update button in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn> object posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir en verdi for egenskapen ValidationGroup, bare validering kontrollene som er en del av den angitte gruppen er godkjent når Oppdater-knappen i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn>objektet legger inn på serveren.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the ValidationGroup property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn.CausesValidation%2A> property is set to `true`, all validation controls on the page that are not assigned to a validation group are validated when the Update button in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn> object posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ikke angir en verdi for egenskapen ValidationGroup og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn.CausesValidation%2A>er satt til `true`, alle kontroller for validering på siden som ikke er tilordnet til en valideringsgruppe er godkjent når Oppdater-knappen i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn>objektet legger inn på serveren.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn.CausesValidation%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen lagres i visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: The group of validation controls for which the Update button in an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn"></xref> causes validation when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Gruppen med validering Kontroller for Oppdater-knappen i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.EditCommandColumn"> </xref> får valideringen når den legger inn på serveren.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng ("").
